item.title: Annie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Annie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Annie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Annie add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Annie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Annie add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Annie add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Annie add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Annie add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Annie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Annie add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Annie add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Don't let the bastards grind you down." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Annie add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Annie add a quote by Jean-Paul Sartre
item.description: "If you're lonely when you're alone, you're in bad company." -- Jean-Paul Sartre

item.title: Annie add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Annie add a quote by William Butler Yeats
item.description: "Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire." -- William Butler Yeats

item.title: Annie add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Annie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Annie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Part of the secret of success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Annie add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Annie add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I am not menopausal. I just wanted half an hour alone. Is that too much to ask? A crappy half hour!" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Annie add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Annie add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Annie add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Annie add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "There is something infantile in the presumption that somebody else has a responsibility to give your life meaning and point… The truly adult view, by contrast, is that our life is as meaningful, as full and as wonderful as we choose to make it." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Annie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Annie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Annie add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Annie add a quote by Time pink floyd
item.description: "And then one day you find ten years have got behind you no one told you when to run you missed the starting gun" -- Time pink floyd
